name: octobay
description: OctoBay - Ethereum Payment Service for GitHub Users

scripts.postinstall: yarn install:chainlink:node && yarn install:chainlink:adapters && yarn install:copyfiles && yarn install:configure-github
scripts.install:chainlink:node: git clone https://github.com/smartcontractkit/chainlink chainlink/.node && cd chainlink/.node && git checkout tags/v0.9.4 && make install
scripts.install:chainlink:adapters: git clone https://github.com/mktcode/octobay-chainlink-adapters chainlink/.adapters && cd chainlink/.adapters && yarn
scripts.install:copyfiles: cp .env.sample .env && cp chainlink/.env.sample chainlink/.node/.env && cp -rf chainlink/.adapters/jobs chainlink/.jobs
scripts.evm:deploy: node set-gsn && truffle migrate --f 1 --to 3 --network development && yarn chainlink:jobs:create && truffle migrate --f 4 --to 5 --network development && node set-octobay
